verses.translation: When comes the Help of Allah, and Victory,

verses.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And thou dost see the people enter Allah's Religion in crowds,
verses.transliteration: Waraayta annasa yadkhuloonafee deeni Allahi afwaja

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.translation: Celebrate the praises of thy Lord, and pray for His Forgiveness: For He is Oft-Returning (in Grace and Mercy).
verses.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirhuinnahu kana tawwaba
